title: Ticket #4729: CEDAR tests (now?) IPv4-only.
description: condor_io/cedar.t.unix.cpp, around line 58, calls bind(). It shouldn't be hard to change the test to bind to IPv4 or IPv6 as directed on the command line (or by the HTCondor configuration, if only one of them is set), but that'd have to be integrated into the test suite, and we haven't decided how to do that generally yet.
